six
sqlalchemy

[:platform_system == "Darwin"]
freetype-py

[:python_version < "3"]

[:python_version < "3.4"]
enum34

[:python_version < "3.6" and platform_machine != "ppc64le"]
ujson<4

[:python_version >= "3.6" and platform_machine != "ppc64le"]
orjson

[:python_version >= "3.6" and platform_machine == "ppc64le"]
ujson

[cassandra]
cassandra-driver

[cli_tools]
deepdiff
texttable

[jupyter]
